title: 17: S3E17  –"Counting Bodies" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Devin Hoover, Alex Taylor, Kyle “K-Man” Mangione-Smith, and J. Rog, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about captive cadavers, collapsed civilizations, evil admirers, and villainous voodoo. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e17
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
